value.title: Microsoft Word: How the new transcription feature works and how it compares to other services
value.excerpt: Word can now turn a conversation or meeting into text ready to use in a document, but that might not come to desktop Word for a while.

value.title: Microsoft adds English (India), Hindi to speech service Neural TTS
value.excerpt: Microsoft India on Tuesday announced the addition of English (India) and Hindi to its Neural Text to Speech (Neural TTS) service language set

value.title: Immersive Reader for Azure Cognitive Services is now generally available
value.excerpt: The Azure Cognitive Service which has been in preview since last year has finally become generally available, bringing additional features such as an updated SDK and new translator languages as well.

value.title: Immersive Reader for Azure Cognitive Services is now generally available
value.excerpt: The Azure Cognitive Service which has been in preview since last year has finally become generally available, bringing additional features such as an updated SDK and new translator languages as well.

value.title: Indian English, Hindi added to Microsoft’s text-to-speech service
value.excerpt: Microsoft India has added English (India) and Hindi to its Neural Text-to-Speech (Neural TTS) service language set. The two Indian languages are among the 15 new dialects added to the service enabled

value.title: New Microsoft live dictation and transcription feature for Word is now available
value.excerpt: Microsoft is looking to make your work from home life easier with a new Transcribe feature for Word on the Web.

value.title: Microsoft gives devs an AI-powered tool to build reading accessibility into their apps
value.excerpt: Microsoft today announced the general availability of Immersive Reader, a service that enables apps to present text in more digestible and accessible ways.

value.title: Google Anthos Gains New Features Including Hybrid AI Capabilities
value.excerpt: Google is betting big on Anthos. With the latest release, it has upped the ante on the hybrid cloud with an aim to gain a foothold in the enterprise.

value.title: Microsoft introduces 15 new languages to its Neural Text-to-Speech service
value.excerpt: Microsoft has announced the addition of 15 new languages to its Neural Text to Speech (Neural TTS) service language set. Neural TTS is a part of Microsoft's Azure Cognitive Services.

value.title: Microsoft introduces Hindi, Indian English to Neural Text-to- Speech service
value.excerpt: Microsoft India has announced the addition of English (India) and Hindi to its Neural Text to Speech (Neural TTS) service language set, featuring the two languages among the 15 new dialects added to the service enabled with state-of-the-art AI audio quality.

value.title: How Microsoft’s Analytics Strategy Might Evolve With a TikTok Buy
value.excerpt: And while Windows is still around, Google's runaway success with its Google Analytics platform, combined with its domination in online search, made Bing a far distant second place choice for consumers.

value.title: Microsoft's AI for Health supports COVID-19 vaccine development
value.excerpt: Given the global urgency of the COVID-19 pandemic, Microsoft's AI for Health program has stepped in to support the development and potential deployment of Vaxine's COVAX-19 vaccine with a philanthropic grant.

value.title: Pandemic Has Online Sellers Leaning on Cloud
value.excerpt: Retailers more than ever are leaning on cloud computing to capitalize on a surge in online shopping without overloading their information-technology systems.

value.title: AmploFly4.0 Now Available on Microsoft Appsource and Azure Marketplace
value.excerpt: Amplo Global Inc announced today that its AI-powered platform is now available on the Microsoft AppSource and Microsoft Azure Marketplace – their online stores providing applications and services for use on Azure.

value.title: Environmental Sustainability And AI
value.excerpt: AI can contribute to your company's carbon footprint or if managed well, help reduce the impact your company has on the environment.
